titles: To the Honourable, the Referrees of his Highnesse most Honourable Councel, in the cause between Sir John Stowell and the purchasers. The humble petition of William Lawrence of Edenburgh, esq.
author: Lawrence, William, 1613 or 14-1681 or 2.
notes: Includes: Reasons that the petitioners purchase ought not to be questioned by Sir John Stowell.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Stawell, John, --  Sir, 1599-1662 --  Estate --  Early works to 1800.
